::: {.cell hash='2015-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_76665387fa04d6de5200d438a19c1a14'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <- data.table::fread("input.txt", sep = "x")
```
:::


## Part 1


::: {.cell hash='2015-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_6707766a5276b541b2c46cb84e409472'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# part 1
tmp <- dt %>%
  .[, c("l", "w", "h") := .(V1 * V2, V2 * V3, V1 * V3)] %>%
  .[, min := ifelse(l <= w & l <= h, l, 
                    ifelse(w <= l & w <= h, w, h))] %>%
  .[, sq := 2*l + 2*w + 2*h + min]
sum(tmp$sq, na.rm = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1598415
```
:::
:::


## Part 2


::: {.cell hash='2015-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_75328c4b226f4e1cf3d9b749fa18a3d5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmp <- dt %>%
  .[, c("l", "w", "h") := .(V1 * V2, V2 * V3, V1 * V3)]
tmp <- tmp[, c("l", "w", "h") := .(V1, V2, V3)] %>%
  .[, max := apply(dt[, .(l, w, h)], 1, max)] %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(test = list(c(l, w, h)))
tmp$min1 <- t(data.frame(sapply(tmp$test, sort)))[,1]
tmp$min2 <- t(data.frame(sapply(tmp$test, sort)))[,2]

tmp <- data.table::data.table(tmp)[,rib := ((2*min1 + 2*min2) + (V1 * V2 * V3))]
sum(tmp$rib, na.rm = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3812909
```
:::
:::
